service-name.description: The name of the service that is registered in consul.

container-port.description: The port number of the Kibana front-end. Defaults to 5601.

image.description: The docker executor image to use.

force-pull-image.description: Forces docker to re-pull the image.

instances.description: The number of Kibana instances to be instantiated.

cpu.description: The amount of CPU resources to allocate to the Kibana instance.

ram.description: The amount of memory to allocate to each Kibana instance.

elasticsearch-service.description: The name of an Elasticsearch service in Consul. Kibana will connect to the first address and port available for this service.

consul-ssl.description: Connect to Consul using SSL. Useful if you are using a custom docker image with a configuration derived from Consul.

consul-ssl-verify.description: Whether or not to verify the Consul certificates. Useful if you are using a custom docker image with a configuration derived from Consul.
